element.hint: Proprietary Laboratory Analyses (PLA) codes describe proprietary clinical laboratory analyses and can be either provided by a single ("sole-source") laboratory or licensed or marketed to multiple providing laboratories (eg, cleared or approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
element.label: CPT PLA Codes
element.name: u_laboratory_certification_lc

element.hint: A modifier provides the means to report or indicate that a service or procedure that has been performed has been altered by some specific circumstance but not changed in its definition or code. Modifiers also enable health care professionals to effectively respond to payment policy requirements established by other entities.
element.label: Modifier
element.name: u_mod
